gr::Shader::Pass Class Reference

#include <Shader.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Begins rendering specified pass using the shader.

Calls Shader::beginPass() in the constructor and Shader::endPass() in the destructor. Use this class instead of the methods directly for exception-safety.

See also:
Shader::begin


Public Member Functions

 Pass (Shader *shader, int pass)
 Starts rendering specified pass.
 ~Pass ()
 Ends rendering specified pass.
